name: MegaCity Riot
description:
Mega City Riot is a Local & Online  Multiplayer Choose between four vehicles to destroy the city before your opponents. Whoever can cause the most wreckage is the winner.

Currently This game only supports Controllers 

Controls:  

  • Left stick - Turning
  • Right Stick- Rotate camera 
  • A - Gas 
  • B- Break 
  • X- Reset Camera 
  • LB - Ability One
  • RB - Ability two 
  • RT- Ability three (N/A) 
  • Select- Change Camera 
  • Start - Open menu 

*** This game is currently a work in progress*** 

Our primary objective in uploading to this platform is gather player feed back early on in the development cycle. 

Online: ***Current Work in Progress***

Online requires Port forwarding on the hosts Router. Some Online features are still not finished

The game currently consists of four Vehicles all specially designed for causing massive amounts of destruction.

All with their own Unique ability’s

  • Raider – small and fast with a jet engine in the back and a ram in the front you will be driving full speed into buildings.
  • ShotShell – A sleek looking car with two large guns attached to the side, you will enjoy drifting around corners and firing your guns at every building you see.
  • Cornman – A Jeep with some heavy modifications, though it’s a slower vehicle don’t let that fool you equipped with a massive plow on the front end, and a large cannon you can use to freely look around and fire a large tank shell to any building you can see. These tank treads will roll over all the rubble you create.
  •  SPF 9000 – Time to turn up the heat this vehicle was designed with a massive flamethrower on the front to set ablaze to the competition, but that is not all with the press of a button this car is also equipped with a massive laser to cut down any obstacles in your way
